body:
I would love a `spack fetch` option to download a package to the current directory.

### Rationale

Whenever I develop a package, the first thing I do is download the tarball to my Downloads folder so I can poke around. It would help to have a command to automate this.

### Description

I'm looking for the following functionality:
```console
$ spack fetch foo --local
```
or something like that. We could also have a `--directory` option that defaults to the current directory.
title: spack fetch to current directory
